title: Texas Tech gives men's basketball coach Mark Adams new contract with raise after leading Red Raiders to Sweet 16 - ESPN
content: Texas Tech gives men's basketball coach Mark Adams new contract with raise after leading Red Raiders to Sweet 16  ESPN
description: Texas Tech coach Mark Adams has a new contract that includes a hefty pay raise and extends his deal through the 2026-27 season after leading the Red Raiders to the Sweet 16 in his first season as head coach.
